Name: Attached
About the game: Attached is a 3D multiplayer survival game. You can build your kingdom with your friends or own yourself. But be careful other players can destroy your progress, eliminate them and be the one. Story Magic was an active force all over the kingdom. People used it to heal their wounds, fight against their enemies. However world is changing, Something started to spread called 'Technology'. Some people call it devil and others try to assimilate it. What do you believe Magic Or Tech? More Attached is a project that evolves with its player base. So please don't mind to contact developers. You can request a copy for your videos, give ideas and suggestions, report bugs etc.. For your main purposes, email us: contact@draculadev.com For bugs and update callbacks, use feedback option in game's main menu For talk any subjects with developers you can join our discord server: discord.gg/2MGhmtM
